thread.title: Did Draymond deliberately kick an opponent again?
thread.title_full: Did Draymond deliberately kick an opponent again?

author: USA TODAY
title: Did Draymond deliberately kick an opponent again?
text:
Did Draymond deliberately kick an opponent again? Here we go again. Post to Facebook Did Draymond deliberately kick an opponent again? Here we go again.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/golden-state-warriors-draymond-green-kick-kicking-blake-griffin-clippers-video   Did Draymond deliberately kick an opponent again? Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 8:04 a.m. ET Feb. 24, 2017 
Los Angeles Clippers' Raymond Felton (2) and Blake Griffin (32) fight for the ball with Golden State Warriors' Draymond Green as Stephen Curry (30) watches during the first half of an NBA basketball game Thursday, Feb. 23, 2017, in Oakland, Calif. (AP Photo/Ben Margot) ORG XMIT: OAS101 (Photo: Ben Margot, AP) 
What a night for Draymond Green. 
On Thursday, he made some stat-sheet contributions to the Golden State Warriors in their win over the Los Angeles Clippers, he talked some serious trash to Clips vet Paul Pierce and, oh yeah, everyone's now speculating that, yet again, he may have kicked an opponent . 
Let's go to the videotape as he went down to the floor to wrestle with Blake Griffin for a loose ball. Draymond showing off his latest kick skill set ðŸ˜‚ pic.twitter.com/tzKpzETwCf
